title: How does anyone actually get anything done or accomplished by wasting their time on on this worthles
content: My Google Pixel 3 Axl is supposedly under warranty from what you guys have told me and you guys have mail me a box for it I put it in the box I mailed it back supposedly I mean it I don't know where it went after I put it in the mailbox but it came back to my house about a week later I opened it up thinking you guys had gotten it and fixed it whatever It is the same phone in the same exact condition it was when it left my possession and does the same exact thing it did which was the reason I sent it to have it fixed I'm curious and concerned cuz did it ever make it to you to allegedly get fixed or did the prepaid posted you guys send me just send it on a flight around town real quick and back to my house and it really concerns me to see all these terrible comments and replies from many different customers on the level of incompetence that has been displayed by these Google people so can you answer them questions please you know I'd like some kind of reply in a timely manner thank you how you like that
